00036 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractFinisher {
00037         
00045         public function process($gp,$settings) {
00046                 $this->gp = $gp;
00047                 $this->settings = $settings;
00048                 
00049                 //make cObj instance for pageLink creation
00050                 $this->cObj = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tslib_cObj');
00051                 $this->cObj->setCurrentVal($GLOBALS['TSFE']->id);
00052                 
00053                 
00054                 //set session value to prevent another validation or finisher circle. MailformPlusPlus will call only this Finisher if the user reloads the page.
00055                 session_start();
00056                 $_SESSION['submitted_ok'] = 1;
00057                 
00058                 //read template file
00059                 if(!$this->templateFile) {
00060                         $templateFile = $settings['templateFile'];
00061                         if(isset($settings['templateFile.']) && is_array($settings['templateFile.'])) {
00062                                 $this->templateFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings['templateFile'],$settings['templateFile.']);
00063                         } else {
00064                                 $this->templateFile = t3lib_div::getURL(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($templateFile));
00065                         }
00066                 }
00067                 
00068                 //set view
00069                 $view = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Confirmation");
00070                 
00071                 #print_r($gp);
00072                 //render pdf
00073                 if(!strcasecmp($gp['renderMethod'],"pdf")) {
00074                         
00075                         //set language file
00076                         if(isset($settings['langFile.']) && is_array($settings['langFile.'])) {
00077                                 $langFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings['langFile'],$settings['langFile.']);
00078                         } else {
00079                                 $langFile = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($settings['langFile']);
00080                         }
00081                         $generatorClass = $settings['pdf.']['class'];
00082                         if(!$generatorClass) {
00083                                 $generatorClass = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_PDF";
00084                         }
00085                         $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent($generatorClass);
00086                         $exportFields = array();
00087                         if($settings['pdf.']['exportFields']) {
00088                                 $exportFields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings['pdf.']['exportFields']);
00089                         }
00090                         $file = "";
00091                         if($settings['pdf.']['export2File']) {
00092                                 //tempnam seems to be buggy and insecure
00093                                 //$file = tempnam("typo3temp/","/mailformplusplus_").".pdf";
00094                                 
00095                                 //using random numbered file for now
00096                                 $file = 'typo3temp/mailformplusplus__'.rand(0,getrandmax()).".pdf";
00097                         }
00098                         $generator->generateFrontendPDF($gp,$langFile,$exportFields,$file);
00099                         
00100                 //render csv
00101                 } elseif(!strcasecmp($gp['renderMethod'],"csv")) {
00102                         $generatorClass = $settings['csv.']['class'];
00103                         if(!$generatorClass) {
00104                                 $generatorClass = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_CSV";
00105                         }
00106                         $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent($generatorClass);
00107                         $exportFields = array();
00108                         if($settings['csv.']['exportFields']) {
00109                                 $exportFields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings['csv.']['exportFields']);
00110                         }
00111                         $generator->generateFrontendCSV($gp,$exportFields);
00112                 }
00113                 
00114                 //show TEMPLATE_CONFIRMATION
00115                 $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'CONFIRMATION');
00116                 $view->setSettings($settings);
00117                 return $view->render($gp,array());
00118         }
00119         
00120         
00121 }
